TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataParameter

summary.span: 表示 Command 对象的参数，也可以表示其到 列的映射；并由访问数据源的 .NET 数据提供程序实现。

span.span: Represents a parameter to a Command object, and optionally, its mapping to columns; and is implemented by .NET data providers that access data sources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口允许继承类实现一个参数类，该类表示命令对象的参数。The interface allows an inheriting class to implement a Parameter class, which represents a parameter to a Command object. 有关参数类的详细信息，请参阅 [配置参数和参数数据类型](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types)。For more information about Parameter classes, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types). 应用程序不会直接创建接口的实例 ，而是创建继承的类的实例 。An application does not create an instance of the interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that inherits . 继承的类 必须实现继承成员，并且通常定义其他成员来添加特定于提供程序的功能。Classes that inherit must implement the inherited members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality. 例如， 接口定义 属性。For example, the interface defines the property. 反过来， 该类继承此属性，并且还定义 属性。In turn, the class inherits this property, and also defines the property. ## Examples 下面的示例通过中的集合，创建派生类的多个实例 。The following example creates multiple instances of the derived class, , through the collection within the . 这些参数用于从数据源中选择数据，并将数据放入中 。These parameters are used to select data from the data source and place the data in the . 此示例假设已 使用相应的架构、命令和连接创建了和。This example assumes that a and a have already been created with the appropriate schema, commands, and connection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlParameter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlParameter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 若要提升 .NET Framework 数据提供程序之间的一致性，请将继承类命名为形式 参数，其中 ，是为特定 .NET Framework 数据提供程序命名空间中的所有类指定的统一前缀。

span.span: To promote consistency among .NET Framework data providers, name the inheriting class in the form Parameter where is the uniform prefix given to all classes in a specific .NET Framework data provider namespace.

para.span: 例如， 是 命名空间中类的前缀 。

span.span: For example, is the prefix of the class in the namespace.

para.span: 从接口继承时 ，应实现以下构造函数：

remarks.format: ## Remarks PrvDbType (，其中 Prv 表示特定于提供程序的前缀) 并且 已链接。The PrvDbType (where Prv represents the provider-specific prefix) and are linked. 因此，将 PrvDbType 更改为支持 PrvDbType。Therefore, setting the changes the PrvDbType to a supporting PrvDbType. 有关支持的数据类型的列表，请参阅相应的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序 PrvDbType 成员。For a list of the supported data types, see the appropriate .NET Framework data provider PrvDbType member. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [DataAdapter 参数](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters)。For more information, see [DataAdapter Parameters](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters).

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the parameter is input-only, output-only, bidirectional, or a stored procedure return value parameter.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 是输出，且关联的执行 不返回值，则 包含 null 值。If the is output, and execution of the associated does not return a value, the contains a null value. 在读取最后一个结果集中的最后一行后，将更新、、 `Output` `InputOut` 和 `ReturnValue` 参数。After the last row from the last resultset is read, `Output`, `InputOut`, and `ReturnValue` parameters are updated. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个实现类的实例， 并设置其一些属性。The following example creates an instance of the implementing class, , and sets some of its properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在过程中，将使用此属性 来确定是否将原始值或当前值用于某个参数值。This property is used by the during the to determine whether the original or current value is used for a parameter value. 这允许更新主键。This allows primary keys to be updated. 和将忽略此属性 。This property is ignored by the and . 此属性设置为属性使用的的版本 ，或 对象的方法 。This property is set to the version of the used by the property, or the method of the object. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个实现类的实例， 并设置其一些属性。The following example creates an instance of the implementing class, , and sets some of its properties. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Value { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.Value : obj with get, set

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the parameter.
An that is the value of the parameter.
The default value is null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于输入参数，值将绑定到 发送到服务器的。For input parameters, the value is bound to the that is sent to the server. 对于输出和返回值参数，值在完成时设置，在 关闭后设置 。For output and return value parameters, the value is set on completion of the and after the is closed. 在将 null 参数值发送到服务器时，用户必须指定 `DBNull` ，而不是 null。When sending a null parameter value to the server, the user must specify `DBNull`, not null. 系统中的 null 值是一个不具有任何值的空对象。The null value in the system is an empty object that has no value. `DBNull` 用于表示 null 值。`DBNull` is used to represent null values. 如果应用程序指定了数据库类型，则当提供程序将数据发送到服务器时，绑定值将转换为该类型。If the application specifies the database type, the bound value is converted to that type when the provider sends the data to the server. 如果提供程序支持接口，则会尝试转换任何类型的值 。The provider attempts to convert any type of value if it supports the interface. 如果指定的类型与值不兼容，则可能会导致转换错误。Conversion errors may result if the specified type is not compatible with the value. 属性被覆盖 。The property is overwritten by . ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个实现类的实例， 并设置其一些属性。The following example creates an instance of the implementing class, , and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlParameter.Value Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter.Value Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlParameter.Value Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter.Value Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
